nodes.excerpt: Find the perfect time across multiple time zones. We have our coworkers, family and friends distributed across the globe. Knowing what time overlaps can get tricky. We created Nomad Time to have a simple, fast and delightful experience.
nodes.title: Nomad Time - A friendly time zone converter
nodes.author: Rafael Chiti

nodes.excerpt: An extensive list of 320+ sales terms and curated resources to help you enrich your vocabulary and develop a deeper understanding of the key concepts.
nodes.title: Sales Glossary by Reply - Your ultimate guide to sales slang
nodes.author: Oleg Campbell

nodes.excerpt: Zepel is the project management software that takes you beyond simple issue tracking. This way, you can plan features, track progress of your entire product development process, and ship customer-focussed software painlessly.
nodes.title: Zepel 2.0 - Jira alternative for software product teams
nodes.author: Vikash Koushik

nodes.excerpt: Athens is an open-source and local-first alternative to Roam Research. Athens is the most powerful and transparent knowledge graph.
nodes.title: Athens Research - Open-source, local-first Roam Research
nodes.author: Jeff Tang

nodes.excerpt: Thundercontent uses artificial intelligence to help you write unique articles on any topic at the speed of light. Spend less money and time, for a better result. Use Thundercontent to write: articles for websites, product pages, blog posts, and more...
nodes.title: Thundercontent - Thundercontent uses AI to help you write articles
nodes.author: Paul G

nodes.excerpt: Weet is a video messaging tool that allows you to have asynchronous conversations with your team, partners, and customers. Weet includes instant recording, screen sharing, virtual background, video filters, emoji reactions, and rich comment options.
nodes.title: Weet - Asynchronous video communication for remote teams
nodes.author: Matthew Howells-Barby

nodes.excerpt: Every time we switch context, it takes us way longer to finish a task at hand. Aerotime creates space for deep work by stacking your meetings together & enables you to prioritize your most important tasks, in flow. Done across team, it saves even more hours.
nodes.title: Aerotime - Group meetings together and find time for deep work
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: We're the #1 weekend co-working club for bootstrappers to stay motivated, get helpful feedback and ship your project faster. Live sessions Saturdays 10am-5pm GMT & US Central time with a dedicated host, run over Slack & Zoom. Plus 100+ software discounts. ğŸ¤¯

nodes.title: Product Manager's Guide - A product manager guide from product vision to product road

nodes.excerpt: Upgrade Zoom with a bluetooth connected keypad that lets you run Zoom with the click of a button. Video calls are easier with your twenty-two favorite Zoom shortcuts on one amazing hotkey pad. Available for both Windows and Mac.
nodes.title: Zapp Pad - Say goodbye to Zoom fails and communicate with confidence
nodes.author: Joe Martin

nodes.excerpt: Track important tasks and projects, create upcoming events, keep notes and control expenses in one notion table. You can quickly find your to-do list or see how much money you spent last week.
nodes.title: Magic Board for Notion - Organize your entire life with one board
nodes.author: Damir Bektilov

nodes.excerpt: Tweet Peep ğŸ‘€ gives you instant, one-click access to what other people are saying about the articles and videos you're browsing. It shortens the great-minds-think-alike process. Let's peep other peopleâ€™s thoughts on media across Twitter!
nodes.title: Tweet Peep - Peep other peopleâ€™s thoughts on media across Twitter

nodes.excerpt: Your favorite tool for sales, marketing, and customer support - erxes - is now available on the go. Keep the ball rolling at any time by managing deals, responding to messages, and updating your CRM. For busy days on the go, erxes mobile is the way to go.
nodes.title: erxes Mobile - Some of the most important CRM and web chat tools on the go
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Minerva is the easiest way to capture and share clickable instructions for anything on the internet. No screenshots. No red arrows. No videos. Just step-by-step guidance. The Minerva Chrome extension lets you embed complex documentation into a URL!
nodes.title: Minerva Pro - A better way to capture and share process online
nodes.author: Trace Cohen

nodes.excerpt: Straw.Page is an extremely simple website builder, focused on creativity. You can use it to design awesome websites straight from your phone
nodes.title: Straw.Page - Extremely simple website builder
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: TLDR This is a web app (+ chrome extension) that helps you summarize any piece of text into concise, easy to digest content so you can free yourself from information overload.
nodes.title: TLDR This - Automatically summarize any article or webpage in a click.
nodes.author: Samanyou Garg

nodes.excerpt: Timedash combines your most vital daily information in one nifty widget: time, date, weather & a daily step counter, all available in one clear overview. Carefully designed with lots of attention to detail, Timedash is a must have widget for your Home Screen!
nodes.title: Timedash Widget - Combines your vital daily information into one nifty widget
nodes.author: Vincent Meertens
